transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Baat mat karo.
Customer: Kya kya kya kya kar rahe ho.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir very good afternoon. Nagendra Bhatt ji baat kar rahe hain Rashma Enterprises se?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Nagendra ji main Vidhi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART team se Bharat ki manager. Aapka discussion hua tha morning mein Bharat se right aapki subscription ke regarding.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute madam. Haan ji.
Customer: Hatiye ha hatiye.
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To main wahi jaanna chah rahi thi sir aapka feedback hame receive hua tha that you are not satisfied with the services right?
Customer: Aapko Kannada aata hai?
Executive: No sir. Are you comfortable in Hindi or English?
Customer: No madam.
Executive: No Hindi English.
Customer: No.
Customer: Sir lead manager is a Hindi but no conversation Kannada usko aata nahi hai. Mere Hindi nahi aata.
Executive: But sir thodi thodi to aap jante ho Hindi.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir little bit Hindi you know little bit Hindi.

Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan. Sir thodi Hindi aati hai aapki thodi thodi.
Customer: Thoda aata hai but complete complete nahi aata.
Executive: Okay aapke nearby koi person available hai jisko Hindi ya English aati ho sir thodi bahut?
Customer: No.
Executive: Nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Okay main ye keh rahi thi main hum dheere se hi baat karte hain hum main ye keh rahi thi aapse ki aapko na main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hoon theek hai. Aapka feedback hamare paas aaya tha ki aap IndiaMART ki service se satisfied nahi ho right?
Customer: Services se keh raha tha but main main business ko close karta but usme Bharat ji ne bola tha account close karna nahi aate bola bola.
Customer: Isliye hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji sir main sun rahi hoon.
Customer: Haan. To hame business ko close karna chahta the.
Executive: But kyu sir business close kyu karna hai matlab offline mein to deal kar rahe ho na aap?
Customer: Offline mein bhi close karta hoon.
Executive: Offline mein bhi close kar rahe ho aap. Close karta hoon close karta hoon isliye IndiaMART se close karna chahta tha.
Executive: Okay. But close kyu kar rahe hain sir matlab koi problem hai ya koi aur reason?
Customer: Local mein business loss karne se online mein aata but online mein ek bhi sale nahi milega to close karna chahta.
Executive: Okay. So sir first of all isko jaise main abhi aapka maine aapka catalog dekha ki aapne starting mein to services use karna shuru kiya tha right but abhi aapne bilkul hi band kar diya aur jaise aapne bola na ki aapko local ki lead chahiye matlab sirf Udupi Karnataka se hi lead chahiye. Udupi Karnataka haan.
Executive: Haan to wo aapko mil sakti hai bas aapko na thoda sa use karna padega matlab aapko jaise Udupi se chahiye to aap Udupi ki hi sirf buylead consume karo.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aapke paas jo calls aur inquiries hai na wo Udupi se hi aayenge sir fir to aap deal kar hi loge na sir agar koi customer samne se aapke paas aata hai. Okay se kitna buyleads aata madam.
Executive: Sir wo to depend karta hai ki daily searches kitne hote hain Udupi mein. Wo to sir depend karta hai na ki Udupi mein daily searches kitne hote hain.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan baki agar aapko isse related like koi problem hai ki kaise use karna hai filter vagera kaise lagana hai to uske liye main Bharat ko ek bar bol deti hoon wo aapko ek bar video meeting se connect kar lega aur aapko sari cheeze properly guide kar dega ki kaise buyleads leni hai ya Udupi mein kaise leads consume karni hai.
Customer: Haan. Haan ye Bharat aapko guide kar dega. Business close karna chahte ho to buyleads kaise?
Executive: Sir but business aap aise mid of the year close nahi kar sakte na sir.
Executive: Ye to shayad aapko jo aapke sales person ne the unko unhone bhi aapko guide kiya hoga iske regarding.
Customer: Okay middle mein close karna chahe to to but loss mein business ko run karna chahta tha.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Last mein business run karna hai.
Executive: Hello. Sir main samajh nahi pa rahi hoon aap kya kehna chah rahe ho.
Customer: Are Hindi nahi aata madam Kannada.
Executive: Achcha. Hindi nahi aati hai aapko Telugu person chahiye right?
Customer: Telugu Kannada.
Executive: Kannad Kannad person Karnataka haan. Karnataka ka.
Executive: Theek hai aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye main koi person arrange karti hoon jo aapse Kannad mein baat kar pae ek bar. Okay okay okay okay okay sir thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close the business with IndiaMART.

- Not getting sales from online platform.

- Wants leads from Udupi Karnataka only.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use Udupi filter.

- Executive offered video meeting with Bharat for guidance.

- Executive mentioned business cannot be closed mid-year.

- Executive will arrange a Kannada-speaking executive.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a Kannada-speaking executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, business closure, language barrier
